Class Save

  • java.lang.Object
    • Save

  • public class Save
extends java.lang.Object
    A class containing methods that save the game, achievements, highscore. Can also clear a save file.
    Version:
    January 16th 2019
    Author:
    Kevin B, Kevin Y

      Saves the game to a text file to be loaded in later.

      • saveFile

        public static void saveFile(Tower[][] save,
                            MyWorld w)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the game to a text file to be loaded in later. Prints important values to the file such as money, lives, round, towers etc.
        Parameters:
        save - The 2d array that contains all the towers
        w - The world being saved
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
